definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: projecting pillar or pilaster—´[[א]] abs. 1Ki 6:31 (but v. infr.) cstr. id. Ez Eze 40:14 (but del. Co):Eze 40:16 (Co better [[אֵילָיו]]); [[אֵיל]] Eze 41:3, [[אֵל]] Eze 40:48; pl. [[אֵילִים]] Eze 40:14 +; [[אֵילִם]] Eze 40:10; sf. [[אילו]] Kt Eze 40:9 + 7 t.; [[אלו]] Kt Eze 40:29 + 2 t. Qr (in all) [[אֵילָיו]], [[אֵלָיו]]; [[אֵלֵיהֵמַָה]] Eze 40:16; —pilaster or projection in wall at each side of entrance (cf. Bö:Proben, 302; NÄ 927), in Sol.’s temple 1Ki 6:31 (Bö:NÄ 525 rds. [[אֵילָם]]), in Ezek.'s temple Ez Eze 40:9, Eze 40:10 + 14 t. Ez Eze 40, Eze 41 + Eze 40:14 a Ew Hi Co [[אילם]] cf. LXX B; Eze 40:38 rd. [[אילם]] so Sm Co cf. LXX; Eze 40:14 b Co del. ´[[א]].
